column1: .@SpeakerPelosi will stop at NOTHING to take down @realDonaldTrump.  First it was the Russia hoax then sham impeachment. Now she’s trying to invoke the 25th amendment because he... fully recovered from the coronavirus?  We won’t let her get away with it. https://t.co/L9fRPFpynC

Every single Senate Democrat just voted against a $500 billion coronavirus relief bill.  Not even ONE Democrat voted to give the American people the relief they desperately need.  A sad day for democracy and a sad day for the American people.
Another huge step forward in our fight against #COVID19! https://t.co/f8piMdx7Sj

A historic breakthrough.  Thanks to @realDonaldTrump the FDA has issued an emergency authorization for blood plasma as a coronavirus treatment.  America is now one step closer to defeating COVID-19. 🇺🇸 https://t.co/CrNu3Ox2uR

No surprise here. We’ve known all along that the Chinese Communist Party has engaged in a sophisticated cover up scheme.  That’s why @LindseyGrahamSC and I introduced the COVID-19 Accountability Act.  China must be held accountable. https://t.co/qvrFFCBQBB

42.6 million Americans have lost their jobs over the last 11 weeks.   This is the damage China created by covering up COVID-19. We must hold them accountable and ensure this never happens again. https://t.co/rzz0gLRNUd

🚨 @USDA just launched applications for the Coronavirus Food Assistance Program 🚨   Farmers and ranchers affected by the pandemic can apply for this relief through August 28. Learn more at https://t.co/vnHOpUv8lb. https://t.co/RigQ9OS8aG

#GoodNewsoftheDay → SK Innovation has donated $400000 to support Georgia in its fight against COVID-19.  This generous donation will help boost our state’s testing capabilities by supporting @AUG_Health’s statewide response.

The Chinese Communist regime has inflicted harm on the U.S. for decades and it’s time for that to change.   The COVID-19 Accountability Act will guarantee China is held fully accountable for the worldwide devastation they’ve caused.   https://t.co/BiUj5F3R2d

#GoodNewsoftheDay → @AUG_Health is beginning antibody testing this week.   This critical tool that will detect whether people have developed antibodies against #COVID19 and will help experts better understand how the virus has spread locally.

No crisis should be exploited to further attacks on innocent life but abortion activists are trying to roll back Hyde Amendment protections in the midst of COVID-19.  The Protecting Life in Crisis Act will put an end to these attacks.  https://t.co/OwdvjgCeRV
As our country faces so many unknowns join me on this #NationalDayofPrayer in praying for the recovery of all who have been affected by COVID—19 and the safety of our heroes on the frontlines.

To all of our nurses courageously working around the clock: Your commitment to providing compassionate care continues to save lives. Thank you for all that you do especially in the midst of #COVIDー19. #ThankYouNurses
Thanks to @realDonaldTrump’s leadership the United States has completed over seven million coronavirus tests — more than any other nation! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/xv2gVTo7nS

We already knew the Chinese Communist Party covered up the severity of #COVIDー19.   But their lies allowed the world to suffer while they hoarded medical supplies.   They must be held accountable.   https://t.co/8FCtEB22CG

May is #TeacherAppreciationMonth!   My wife Lisa has been teaching for over 30 years. I'm constantly amazed by how she – and all teachers – work tirelessly to equip our next generation especially in the midst of COVID-19.   To all of our teachers thank you! #SendTeachersLove https://t.co/NUoN5CHN6f

Now more than ever our pharmacies are working hard to support patients despite the financial strain they were facing even before this pandemic.   That’s why I support including pharmacy DIR clawback reform in the next coronavirus aid package to keep pharmacies stabilized. https://t.co/HgV0xZltRI

Democrats delayed and delayed while small businesses suffered.   But as soon as we return to Washington the first action they take is forming a Select Committee to investigate @realDonaldTrump's response to #COVIDー19.  Now more than ever it's clear where their priorities lie.

Dropped by @JaemorFarms today to pick up some fresh strawberries. Don’t forget to thank our farmers and growers — who are working tirelessly to put food on our tables in the midst of #COVID19 — by shopping @GeorgiaGrown products! https://t.co/c7Mabi9AcR

China's coverup of #COVIDー19 and their continued lies about its origin have shown us all firsthand that we cannot trust the word of the Chinese government.   That's why I'm calling on @USDA to reconsider allowing the U.S. to import citrus from China. https://t.co/VujHfmw6aE

Glad to join my colleagues in advocating for increased flexibility for rural hospitals in the next relief package.  The challenges facing rural hospitals have been magnified in the midst of this pandemic and it’s critical they remain on solid footing post #COVID19. Full letter→ https://t.co/2faJWS8qam
Reminder → Tax Day has been is postponed until July 15 2020 due to #COVID—19.   Americans can file and make their tax payments at this later date without penalty. https://t.co/DKItTOix0Q

The @FCC is now accepting applications for the #COVIDー19 Telehealth Program.  Health care providers can use these funds to purchase the connectivity and devices they need to care for patients remotely.  Apply here today → https://t.co/w8OqLHeJGy

Due to the #coronavirus outbreak thousands of Georgians are being forced to work from home increasing the strain on broadband networks.   Read the letter I sent to @Windstream with @AustinScottGA08 and @SanfordBishop calling for increased internet access in rural areas. https://t.co/Juzh8OxHY8

Since day one the Chinese Communist Party has lied about #COVIDー19 and put the rest of the world at risk.  The @WHO's response? Praise China's response while criticizing @realDonaldTrump's travel restrictions.  Proud to support @GReschenthaler's resolution to defund @WHO. https://t.co/R4ATIaajxH

Gainesville-based @SyfanLogistics is helping lower the risk of exposure to #COVID19 for truckers and consumers.   By cutting contact this company is working to #SlowTheSpread and keep the American supply chain strong. #AmericaWorksTogether https://t.co/qvSc4cD0ro
Today on #WorldHealthDay we celebrate the work of our brave health care professionals fighting on the frontlines against #COVIDー19.  Thank you for putting your lives at risk in order to save others!

As Georgia’s shelter-in-place goes into effect today I want to remind Georgians that we are #InItTogether.  This action is being taken to #SlowTheSpread of #COVIDー19 but this is NOT a reason to panic.  Find answers to your questions here ↓ https://t.co/QvWYBb6kRR

🚨 NEW → Today small businesses can start applying for the Paycheck Protection Program.  This #CARESAct program provides forgivable loans to businesses paying their employees during #COVID19.  Learn more here → https://t.co/Jyx5PaV8PA https://t.co/6uFxlA58vl

Rather than calling for a commission to investigate @realDonaldTrump’s coronavirus response Adam Schiff should focus on doing his job and look into China's role in the spread of #COVID19.  Maybe if he wasn’t so obsessed with impeachment Congress could have acted sooner. https://t.co/xlxSQtl77f

Having access to state-specific updates in the midst of #COVID19 is critical.   That’s why I wrote the @FCC advocating for immediate access to in-state programming for northeast Georgia’s orphan counties whose local news comes from neighboring states.   Read my letter here → https://t.co/NIEGwtVO6E

.@UVALaw this is absolutely shameful.  Every university should support their students’ commitments to serve in the Armed Forces particularly in the midst of #COVIDー19 when our country needs them most.  You should reverse your decision immediately. https://t.co/enyE5JaFlF

Think about this → the first #coronavirus case in the U.S. was confirmed on January 15.   The same day @SpeakerPelosi delivered the articles of impeachment to the Senate.  Maybe if she stopped playing political games our country could focus on what really matters. https://t.co/GMTqa5gCNk

Our truckers are working overtime to maintain our food supply chain during #COVID19 and we need to protect their health and safety.  After hearing from truckers across Georgia I wrote to @USDOT requesting they loosen certain regulations and provide guidelines for truckers. https://t.co/ax7mllme8E
In the midst of #coronavirus @realDonaldTrump is working for the people.   Meanwhile Speaker Pelosi is working as the pied piper of pork for liberal ideas. https://t.co/6uFGi9Gn9b

Good news for Georgians! This afternoon @realDonaldTrump approved Georgia’s disaster declaration freeing up federal resources to fight #COVIDー19 throughout Georgia and help save lives. https://t.co/QDWH24w1ab
.@realDonaldTrump has never wavered in his approach to fighting #coronavirus.   He is working to put the health of Americans first and create a booming economy. https://t.co/oePjNDySf9

As harvest season approaches we’re reminded that Georgia farmers and truckers are integral to our food supply.  In the face of #COVIDー19 we’re committed to ensuring they have the resources they need to continue putting food on our tables. #InItTogether https://t.co/JhsYnE1G4U

Moonrise Distillery a family-run operation in #GA09 is now producing hand sanitizer and donating it to Rabun County’s emergency responders.   Another amazing example of supporting our communities in the face of #coronavirus. #InItTogether https://t.co/CJiBkLdCMM

Our medical professionals are taking incredible risks to stop the spread of #coronavirus but they're in need of more medical equipment.  Earlier today I urged the Trump Administration to temporarily ban all exports of medical equipment that help us fight #COVIDー19. https://t.co/pL6cFJX85C

Americans should be encouraged by the ways in which the private sector has partnered with @realDonaldTrump and his administration in the midst of #COVIDー19.  This is the American spirit at work. We are #InItTogether.  Read more from Peter Navarro ↓ https://t.co/21XpGgJCnB

While Americans are hurting @SenSchumer and @SpeakerPelosi are holding #coronavirus relief hostage in an effort to further their liberal agenda.  A global health crisis is not the time to play politics. We must provide American workers with the relief they desperately need.

As @realDonaldTrump said we will come out of this crisis.   But right now our farmers truckers and independent contractors are bearing the brunt of #COVIDー19 and they need our support. https://t.co/zyYNMtpQ4d

We must look out for the small businesses across Georgia seeking relief due to #coronavirus.  Read the letter I sent with members of the Georgia delegation thanking @SBAgov for designating all 159 counties in Georgia as eligible to receive small business loans. #gapol https://t.co/cjK226K38a

.@USTreasury and @IRSnews are providing payment relief to individuals and businesses by extending most tax payment deadlines to July 15 2020.  Read full details on tax changes in response to #coronavirus here → https://t.co/HNJlu5rGZH https://t.co/uzvtOEBVtE

Good news for Georgians! @SBAgov approved Georgia’s declaration for disaster loan assistance.  Small businesses are the backbone of our economy and they need our help now more than ever.  Those affected by #COVIDー19 can apply for loan assistance here: https://t.co/gzHniifxy2 https://t.co/MaLLMLlI16
Good news! More testing kits have been delivered to @GaDPH.  This will double our state’s testing capacity for #COVID19 by the end of the week!

As schools close due to #coronavirus our education system is continuing to equip the next generation. These are the necessary steps to keep our students teachers and administrators safe. Together we are doing our part to #slowthespread. #GA09 https://t.co/7b7tjuigV5

Thanks to the leadership of @SecretarySonny @USDA is partnering with the private sector to provide nearly ONE MILLION meals a week to students in rural areas who are affected by #COVID19! https://t.co/xrpe6JLoYB

As we continue the fight against #COVIDー19 we must ensure Americans have access to the food they need.  Read the letter @AustinScottGA08 and I sent to @SecPompeo on protecting Georgia farmers’ abilities to put food on American tables in the midst of a global health emergency. https://t.co/gokQtjxayo

Even if you're young and feel healthy please follow @realDonaldTrump's new guidelines to #SlowtheSpread   ❌Avoid gatherings of 10+ people ❌Don’t eat out — use pick up or delivery options ❌Wash your hands regularly   You can be asymptomatic and still be a carrier of #COVIDー19 https://t.co/FNCo3ZseEg

To all of our doctors nurses first responders and public safety officers fighting on the front lines: Thank you.  In a time of uncertainty we are grateful for your tireless work to keep us healthy and safe! #COVIDー19

Every American has a critical role to play in stopping the spread of #COVIDー19.  To stay informed on the most recent guidance and resources available to you subscribe to our newsletter here ↓ https://t.co/YrPx5PeBp5

.@realDonaldTrump and the Trump administration are taking decisive action to combat #coronavirus:   ✓ Declared a national emergency to free up federal resources ✓ Partnering with the private sector to expand #COVIDー19 testing ✓ Restricting travel to keep Americans safe

On this National Day of Prayer we come together to pray for all who have suffered from and been affected by #coronavirus here in the United States and all across the world.  Today we unite as one nation under God to ask for His comfort and healing.

The health and safety of our communities remains our number one priority.  Follow the @CDCgov's guidelines on https://t.co/3iWoakCb9K to learn how to best prevent the spread of #COVIDー19. https://t.co/Ccflz6nYnb

Heartbreaking news. Our prayers go out to his family and loved ones.   Please continue following the @CDCgov’s guidance and take all precautions necessary to protect yourself your family and your communities. Together we will overcome #COVID19. https://t.co/zvrAcPEhxi
As concerns of #coronavirus spread here’s some information on how to keep your homes workplaces and schools safe → https://t.co/IaU4I3tI3K

Our top priority as a country is to fight #coronavirus and prevent its spread throughout the U.S.   In the face of a public health crisis like coronavirus we must work together to contain #COVID19. American lives are not a game – we must get this right.

.@realDonaldTrump is taking bold and decisive action to prevent the spread of #coronavirus and protect every American.  As @POTUS said tonight Americans always rise to the challenge. Together we will overcome #COVID19
I'll be joining @cvpayne shortly to discuss the latest developments on #COVID19. Tune in to @FoxNews at 4:15pm.

To fight the #coronavirus resort back to the things that have always been done to keep us healthy.   These best health practices are our best defense against #COVID19.  Visit @CDCgov's website for more information: https://t.co/N2rAthPpHn

Here are a few best practices to prevent the spread of #COVID19:   ✔️Wash your hands with soap for 20+ seconds ✔️Avoid touching your face ✔️Cover your mouth when you cough and sneeze ✔️Stay home if you are sick ✔️Contact your health care provider if you exhibit symptoms

The American people can be reassured that @realDonaldTrump and @VP Pence have been preparing for this moment but there are the actions YOU and your families can take to stop the spread of the #coronavirus.

.@realDonaldTrump is working to stop the spread of #coronavirus and keep Americans safe.  Meanwhile House Democrats are bringing the #NoBanAct to the floor which would hinder @POTUS from using his authority to restrict travel like he's done to prevent the spread of #COVID19.

Honored to welcome @realDonaldTrump to Atlanta today!   @POTUS @VP and our public health officials are taking bold action to prevent the spread of #coronavirus and protect the health and safety of all Americans. #gapol
